resources.string: With ML Kits barcode scanning API, you can read data encoded using most standard barcode formats.
With ML Kits face detection API, you can detect faces in an image and identify key facial features.
With ML Kits image labeling APIs, you can recognize entities in an image without having to provide any additional contextual metadata, using either an on-device API or a cloud-based API.
With ML Kits landmark recognition API, you can recognize well-known landmarks in an image.
With ML Kit text recognition APIs, you can recognize text in any Latin-based language (and more, with Cloud-based text recognition).
